title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Airbus H135 helicopter - Autopilot
description:
In this video I will show you how to use the autopilot functionality of the Airbus H135. Compared to other airplanes the autopilot functionality is limited but it is still very useful for longer flights. 

If you also want to give the helicopter a try download the  Airbus H135 from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/discover/helicopter
